upload_distance.description: When within this range, the 'upload discovery' stratagem becomes usable/available

fail_distance.description: When outside this range, the upload will start to cancel. Should be larger than upload distance

upload_duration.description: Duration in seconds which you need to stay within upload range of target until succeeding

assignment_id.description: [string]Name of the assignment which is awarded and completed when succesfully uploading.

vo_id_examine.description: [string]VO line to play when examining/interacting with the discovery.

vo_id_completed.description: [string]VO line to play when successfully uploading the discovery

vo_id_ignored.description: [string]VO line to play when player leaves the upload distance radius without having completed the upload.

trigger_for_everyone.description: [bool]When interacted with, everyone can access it

ui_help_text.description: [string]UI help text to show for active upload data as part of an objective
